message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. I think it would be incredibly beneficial for you. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $12,500. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  How about we meet in the middle? I could let it go for $11,000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm trying to be reasonable, but I need to stay within my budget.
